page.title: 13AN ENGLISH SUNDAY
page.content: On Sunday morning I get up 9.30.,get washed and dressed and put on my best clothes.I go downstairs and have my breakfast of cornflakes and milk and then have eggs and bacon and a cup of tea.At 10.45., I go to the Methodist Church and meet a lot of friends.Sometimes I am asked to take the Collection plate round.I like to do this because it is a great honour.The service starts with a hymn and then prayers.The children leave the main service to go to Sunday School to learn about the Bible.The service lasts about one hour then we go home for dinner.We usually have roast meat,potatoes and vegetables.After dinner we watch television if the weather is not very good or we go in the car to visit friends or relatives or perhaps to go to a zoo or museum etc.
